alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 30 at 1:42PM AKST until January 01 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions ongoing. Winds gusting 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast including Wales. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions will occur Saturday night into Sunday.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
